senasurada iwarayi ada irida moratuwa wishwawidyalaye ee hostal eka eha paththe siwil injineru deparmenthuwa paththata thiyana pihibiya gas assen eliya watila eeka wisthara karanna bari tharamata lassanayi.me loke hamadema lassanata dakinna puluwan.ooni nam yuddayak wirahawak maranayak me hamademath maha lassanata dakinna puluwan.habayi eka dakinne kohoma da kiyala danne ape hithama thamayi ape asma thamayi.

“tayitanik ” sarasawi prakashanayaki.nadi panditharathnasuprakata gayaka nimal gunasekarayan this wasaraka guwan widuli athdakim asuren rachana kala “miyasi maga saha guwan widuliye noasu rasakatha” yana grantha dwithwaya mema masa 25 wanida, dahawal 12.00 ta shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawe aananda samarakon madiriyedi eli dakweyi.medina pradhana amuththan washayen sanskruthika ha kala katayuthu amathya ti.bi. eekanayaka saha shri lanka guwan widuli sanstha sabhapathi hadsan samarasinha yana mahathwarun sahabhagiwimata niyamithaya.prawina madhyawedi sujiwa disanayaka pariwarthanaya kala aluthma granthaya ‘sahodariyo’ labana 27 wanida kolambaa 07, jathika pusthakala ha pralekhana sewa mandala shrawanagarayedi pawathwe.dayawansha jayakodi saha samagama wisin prakashayata pathkarana lada ‘sahodariyo’ pariwarthana kruthiya dorata wadime uthsawaye mulasuna mahacharya kambaurugamuwe wajira himipanan hobawana athara mahacharya rohana lakshman piyadasa saha aacharya tiyudar wirasinha yana mahathwarun wishesha desum pawathwathi.mema awasthawedi dayawansha jayakodi saha samagama 2011 wasare dipa wyapthawa pawath wu nawakatha athpitapath tharagayen jayagrahanaya kala ampara malwaththa pare, piyadasa udawaththa liyu ‘baddata handa payawith’ nawakathawa sandaha wana rupiyal 50,000/- ka mudal thyagaya saha sammana pradanaya da sidu kere.-

shri lanka waidya sabhawa wisin niyamitha karala thiyena pramithin anugamanaya nokirima pilibandawa, ee wagema eya aarambha karala thiyena aakaraya pilibandawa, ehi kriyathmaka wima pitupasa thibena wanchanika swabhawaya pilibanda ha eya raka ganima wenuwen pasugiya aanduwe wagema me aanduwe baladharin katayuthu karamin sitina ithama saka sahitha aakaraya pilibandawa mewa sambandayen prashna thiyenawa, aththa washayenma ee prashna diha balapuwahama apita kiyanna puluwan deyak thamayi me paudgalika anshayata adhyapanaya wiwrutha karadima nisa athiwiya hakke kumana thathwayakda kiyana pilibandawa prakashayata pathkarana ithama kadima nidarshanayak lesa apata penwanna puluwan me sayitam aayathanaya pilibanda nidarshayen.

eeefpi puwath aayathanaye daththa anuwa 2015 wasare sita jihad praharawalata lakwi pudgalayin 238 deneku miyayama menma mathadi ellawu praharawala wagakima islamiya rajya sanwidhanaya bharaganimath samaga islamiya sannaddhabhawaya pilibada gataluwa chandaye pradhana karunak bawata pathwa atha.

ese wuwada rajapaksha kandayamata wada asiru wanne janadhipathiwaranayak bawin saha janadhipathiwaranayak 2019 janawariyen pasuwa kadawime hakiyawak janadhipathiwarayata himiwana bawin eya janadhipathi maithripalage salasma wiya.
